article:
Gradients can be defined in the defs elementSee also Gradients and Patterns . For example:
<linearGradient id="linearGradient4144" <stop offset="5%" stop-color="#F60" /> <stop offset="95%" stop-color="#FF6" /> </linearGradient>
The following attributes are supported for the linear gradient specification:
id: the id of the gradient, to use in shapes which refer to this gradient
x1 and y1
stroke-linecap
stroke-linejoin
stroke-miterlimit
